title: card.motion.sync Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Configures automatic sync triggered by Notecard movement.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

start.description: Set to true to start motion-triggered syncing

stop.description: Set to true to stop motion-triggered syncing

minutes.description: The maximum frequency at which sync will be triggered

count.description: The number of most recent motion buckets to examine

threshold.description: The number of buckets that must indicate motion in order to trigger a sync
